text: On May 6, 2022, Hotel Saratoga, a five-story luxury hotel in Havana, Cuba had a suspected gas leak explosion that damaged large parts of the building. At least forty-two people died, while another ninety-four were injured. At the time of the explosion, the hotel was undergoing renovations and there were no guests, however there were fifty-one workers inside the hotel. ==References== Category:May 2022 events Category:Explosions in 2022
title: Hotel Saratoga explosion
